did.repository: University of Minnesota. Children's Literature Research Collections. [clrc]
did.abstract: This collection consists of print production materials by David Stemple for 1 published title.
did.physloc: Materials are housed in the Andersen Library caverns. Please allow 30 minutes for retrieval.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of print production materials by David Stemple for 1 published title.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: Materials are arranged alphabetically by published title and chronologically within each title.

controlaccess.head: INDEX TERMS
controlaccess.p: This collection is indexed under the following headings in the catalog of the University of Minnesota Libraries. Researchers desiring materials about related topics, persons or places should search the catalog using these headings.
controlaccess.subject: Wild turkeys

unittitle.title: High Ridge Gobbler, illustrated by Ted Lewin, published New York: Collins, 1979.
